name: Polyglot Coding Standards Analyzer
summary: Evaluate code quality across 8+ languages using language-agnostic principles and language-specific best practices.

name: FedRAMP POAM Quality Check
summary: Validates FedRAMP Plan of Action and Milestones (POAM) files for structural integrity, naming conventions, deduplication, and cross-sheet consistency

name: OSCAL SSP Validator
summary: Validates OSCAL System Security Plan documents against schemas, profiles, and cross-reference requirements with tiered validation depth.

name: Create a New Skill from Topic
summary: Generate a production-ready SKILL.md + tiny examples, evals, and an index entry aligned to Anthropic Skills.

name: Testing Strategy Composer
summary: Compose comprehensive testing strategies spanning unit, integration, e2e, and performance tests with optimal coverage.
